ygData.subject: Selling vials
ygData.msgSnippet: I am very proud of my little halfling cleric, Feanu.  She s only lvl 5 and her pottery skill is up to 96.  She can make poison vials, and all kinds of cooking
ygData.messageBody:
I am very proud of my little halfling cleric, Feanu. She's only lvl 5
and her pottery skill is up to 96. She can make poison vials, and all
kinds of cooking equipment. She has a full stack of poison vials, and
no one to give them to.

I'd like to auction them - what is a reasonable price to ask? I'm on
the Prexus server.

Speaking of zombie skins - I make regular runs of the markets and
collect quite a lot of skins. All 3 inns (all vendors) will have zombie
skins at various times, the vendors in the tunnel, the Fishing village
of NRo, and the Gypsy camp in Oasis (I only do this in daylight running
very fast). While "shopping" I also pick up specialty meats (gator,
wolf, bear, lion) whenever I see them for hubby's baker.

Thanks for your help.

--
Jeanne Mitchell, Austin, TX
"You can tell the quality of a person by how
they treat people they don't need." My Dad
